name: Apps (Okta API)
description: The [Okta Application API](http://developer.okta.com/docs/api/rest/apps.html) provides operations to manage applications and/or assignments to users or groups for your organization.

requests.name: Activate App
Update App Credentials for Assigned User
List Apps Assigned to User
Add Basic Auth App
Assign User to App for SSO & Provisioning
List Apps
Add Custom SAML 2.0 App
Add Plugin SWA App
Add Custom SWA App
Share/Clone Certificate
Update Application Certificate
Get Certificate
Set Plugin SWA to User Edit UserName & Password
Set Plugin SWA to User Edit Password
Remove User from App
List ACTIVE Apps
Get Assigned User for App
Set Plugin SWA to Okta Password
Get App
List Assigned Groups
Preview SAML metadata
Add WS-Fed App
requests.rawModeData:
{
  "name": "template_wsfed",
  "label": "Sample WS-Fed App",
  "signOnMode": "WS_FEDERATION",
  "settings": {
    "app": {
      "audienceRestriction": "urn:example:app",
      "groupName": null,
      "groupValueFormat": "windowsDomainQualifiedName",
      "realm": "urn:example:app",
      "wReplyURL": "https://example.com/",
      "attributeStatements": null,
      "nameIDFormat": "urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.1:nameid-format:unspecified",
      "authnContextClassRef": "urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:2.0:ac:classes:PasswordProtectedTransport",
      "siteURL": "https://example.com",
      "wReplyOverride": false,
      "groupFilter": null,
      "usernameAttribute": "username"
    }
  }
}

requests.name: Deactivate App
Generate Certificate
Update App Profile for Assigned User
Set Plugin SWA to Administrator Sets Username and Password
Assign Group to App

Assign User to App for SSO
Remove Group from App
Get Apps Assigned to User
Set Plugin SWA to Shared Creds

requests.headers:
Accept: application/json
Authorization: SSWS {{apikey}}

List Users Assigned to App
